column4: what's the difference between ubuntu desktop and server? i have a server cd and i'd like to run ubuntu as a desktop... do i have to download ubuntu desktop?
no, if you have a quick internet, just install ubuntu-desktop with synaptic after installing the cd
what's with the kernel difference though?
server is oriented towards servers, most particularly it can address more than about 3.2 gb; you could install linux-generic to switch to the desktop kernel
